metadata.name: Get Freaky #1
metadata.description:
This NFT includes only a sample of the original music, own it and go to the NFT page on KLOOV to listen to the Full Track https://kloov.com/dirtydan/full-track/get-freaky.

Get Freaky is a twisted Tech House jam filled with wild baselines and chunky grooves Dirty Dan gives you a freaky dance Dance track. With the Get Freaky Vocal, Fierce rolls and a deep breakdown that will be a great add to your IPod, dj set or song collection.  Enjoy this first NFT from Dan. 

Giveaway

- 20 minutes production class
- Free exclusive track:  https://hearthis.at/dirtydanmusic/dirty-dan-limb-bi-limb/BMU/
- Stickers package (with Label and Dirty Dan stickers)
